org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.persistence.file

Class AsyncFileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.persistence.file.AsyncFileIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, FileIO

    public class AsyncFileIO
extends Object
implements FileIO
    File I/O implementation based on AsynchronousFileChannel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates I/O implementation for specified file

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Truncates current file to zero length and resets current file position to zero.

      Closes current file.
